\newcommand{\ottprogram}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{program}  ,\ \ottnt{prog}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{statement}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{program}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{sequencing}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{expr}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{program}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{the semantics of this are ``evaluate expr performing
    side-effects in the process'', currently there are no side effects
    during evaluation of expressions but there will be in the future,
    e.g. function calls are expressions and may be effectful}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{nop} \, \ottsym{;}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{end of program}}}

\newcommand{\ottstatement}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{statement}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{let} \, \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{type}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{expr}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{identifier}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{expr}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{if} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{expr}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{prog_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}} \, \ottkw{else} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{prog_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{while} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{expr}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{prog}  \ottsym{]}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottexpr}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{expr}  ,\ \ottnt{e}  ,\ \ottnt{f}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{bool}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{number}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{string}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{identifier}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{op} \, \ottnt{expr}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{expr_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{op} \, \ottnt{expr_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{expr}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{id_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{id_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{prog}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}}
